# Encryption Configuration
ENCRYPTION_ENABLED=false
ENCRYPTION_PASSWORD_HASH=
# Salt will be automatically generated and managed by the system
# ENCRYPTION_SALT=cybersecurity_agent_salt

# MCP Configuration
MCP_SERVER_PATH=/path/to/mcp/server
MCP_SERVER_ARGS=""

# LangGraph Configuration
LANGGRAPH_LOG_LEVEL=INFO
LANGGRAPH_CHECKPOINT_DIR=./checkpoints

# Session Management
SESSION_LOGS_DIR=./session-logs
SESSION_OUTPUTS_DIR=./session-outputs

# Knowledge Base
KNOWLEDGE_BASE_DIR=./knowledge-objects
MASTER_CATALOG_FILE=master_catalog.db

# Framework Processing
MAX_FRAMEWORK_SIZE=1000000
SUPPORTED_FORMATS=json,csv,xml,ttl,stix

# Memory Dimensions
SHORT_TERM_THRESHOLD=1000
RUNNING_TERM_THRESHOLD=10000
LONG_TERM_THRESHOLD=100000
